headline: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) Reports Strong Income, Large Buyback & Raises Sales Guidance
summary: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) announced its Q1 2025 earnings on May 1, revealing a net income increase to $412 million, despite a revenue dip to $5,218 million, alongside a share buyback update and raised sales guidance for 2025. The company's share price jumped 15.74% last week. In parallel, the broader market rose 1.8% amid positive U.S. job data and potential tariff talks with China. Carrier's solid financial performance and proactive buyback efforts bolstered investor confidence, reinforcing...

headline: Carrier Completes Acquisition of Addvolt, Enhancing its Electrification Solutions
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, has acquired long-term partner Addvolt, S.A., a Portuguese transport electrification technology company.
